title: Kick
description: From USA Today Bestseller - CD ReissFiona Drazen, sex addict, submissive slave, celebutante, trapped in a mental ward until Dr. Elliot Chapman can help her remember why she's there. But once she does, she might not want to go home to the Master she tried to kill.***This is the first of a serial. It's about 120 pages and ends in a cliffhanger, because that's how I roll. There's also a ton of drug use, and educated men who like dirty sex, because that's also how I roll***This same exact story appeared in the banned BEND anthology.
author: C.D. Reiss
